meanings.sent1: The roller coaster was funner than the merry-go-round.
meanings.sent2: Playing with friends is always funner than playing alone.
meanings.sent3: The clown's silly dance was even funner than his jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like music, making the room feel even funner.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fireworks made the night sky look even funner.

meanings.sent1: The magic show was funner than the puppet show.
meanings.sent2: Watching a movie with popcorn is always funner than watching it without.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppies made the park visit even funner.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful sunset made the beach scene even funner.
meanings.sent5: The exciting race made the crowd cheer even funner.
